name: Narhw4l's Spinner Clicker - With Game
description:
Sorry about the itch page not having a game linked on to it. It was my very first upload onto itch.io so I'm sorry to anyone who could not download it. Thank you @GentoGamer for telling me about this!

EPILEPSY WARNING

This project was for the Kenney Jam.  The theme: ROTATION.

Welcome to narhw4l's Spinner Clicker!

Playing this game, spin and click your way to getting richer and richer!

How to play:

- Your spinner will spin itself automatically for coins. Click the very center of the spinner to increase the number of coins you get.

- When you go into the shop (Press "q")  you can buy and upgrade your spinner to go faster and to gain more coins per second. 

- WARNING: If you go to a different page in the game, your progress will get reset.

- Finally, have fun!

(Sorry you have to download, the WebGL was not working and I didn't have the time to fix it.) :(
